item.title: Need help with jail code
item.dc:creator: @alysonj9 alysonj9
item.description:
@alysonj9 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3015; c.teleportToY = 3194; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You Have been thrown in jail!"); c.sendMessage("I would say sorry if I were you"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2722; c.teleportToY = 4904; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("Hope you have learned the Lesson!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
